authors.author: Peter Drucker
quotes: The best way to predict the future is to create it.

authors.author: Leonardo da Vinci
quotes: Simplicity is the ultimate sophistication.

authors.author: Winston Churchill
quotes: Success is not final, failure is not fatal: It is the courage to continue that counts.
Success is walking from failure to failure with no loss of enthusiasm.
You have enemies? Good. That means you've stood up for something, sometime in your life.

authors.author: Albert Einstein
quotes: Creativity is intelligence having fun.
Imagination is more important than knowledge.
In the middle of difficulty lies opportunity.

authors.author: Muhammad Ali
quotes: He who is not courageous enough to take risks will accomplish nothing in life.
Don't count the days, make the days count.

authors.author: Nelson Mandela
quotes: It always seems impossible until it's done.

authors.author: Thomas Edison
quotes: I have not failed. I've just found 10,000 ways that won't work.

authors.author: Andrew Carnegie
quotes: The secret of success lies not in doing your own work, but in recognizing the best person to do it.

authors.author: Steve Jobs
quotes: The only way to do great work is to love what you do.
Innovation distinguishes between a leader and a follower.

authors.author: Martin Luther King Jr.
quotes: The time is always right to do what is right.
Our lives begin to end the day we become silent about things that matter.
We must accept finite disappointment, but never lose infinite hope.

authors.author: Confucius
quotes: Our greatest glory is not in never falling, but in rising every time we fall.
It does not matter how slowly you go as long as you do not stop.
The man who moves a mountain begins by carrying away small stones.

authors.author: Walt Disney
quotes: The way to get started is to quit talking and begin doing.
All our dreams can come true, if we have the courage to pursue them.
If you can dream it, you can do it.

authors.author: Ralph Waldo Emerson
quotes: Do not go where the path may lead, go instead where there is no path and leave a trail.
What lies behind us and what lies before us are tiny matters compared to what lies within us.
The only person you are destined to become is the person you decide to be.

authors.author: Theodore Roosevelt
quotes: Believe you can and you're halfway there.
Do what you can, with what you have, where you are.
Keep your eyes on the stars and your feet on the ground.

authors.author: Eleanor Roosevelt
quotes: Great minds discuss ideas; average minds discuss events; small minds discuss people.
The future belongs to those who believe in the beauty of their dreams.
With the new day comes new strength and new thoughts.

authors.author: John F. Kennedy
quotes: Leadership and learning are indispensable to each other.

authors.author: Henry Ford
quotes: Failure is simply the opportunity to begin again, this time more intelligently.

authors.author: Barack Obama
quotes: Change will not come if we wait for some other person or some other time. We are the ones we've been waiting for. We are the change that we seek.

authors.author: Mark Twain
quotes: The secret of getting ahead is getting started.

authors.author: Vidal Sassoon
quotes: The only place where success comes before work is in the dictionary.

authors.author: Babe Ruth
quotes: Every strike brings me closer to the next home run.

authors.author: J.K. Rowling
quotes: It is our choices that show what we truly are, far more than our abilities.

authors.author: Aristotle
quotes: There is only one way to avoid criticism: do nothing, say nothing, and be nothing.

authors.author: Sam Levenson
quotes: Don't watch the clock; do what it does. Keep going.

authors.author: Franklin D. Roosevelt
quotes: The only limit to our realization of tomorrow is our doubts of today.

authors.author: Roy T. Bennett
quotes: Success is not how high you have climbed, but how you make a positive difference to the world.

authors.author: Chinese Proverb
quotes: The best time to plant a tree was 20 years ago. The second best time is now.

authors.author: Oprah Winfrey
quotes: Turn your wounds into wisdom.
The more you praise and celebrate your life, the more there is in life to celebrate.

authors.author: C.S. Lewis
quotes: Hardships often prepare ordinary people for an extraordinary destiny.
You are never too old to set another goal or to dream a new dream.
